00049 struct AppPolicy : Config::Policy {
00050   static void init() {
00051     alias("reactors", "Kfs.Broker.Reactors");
00052     alias("workers",  "Kfs.Broker.Workers");
00053   }
00054 };
00055 
00056 typedef Meta::list<AppPolicy, DfsBrokerPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> AppPolicies;
00057 
00058 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00059   try {
00060     init_with_policies<AppPolicies>(argc, argv);
00061 
00062     int port = get_i16("DfsBroker.Port");
00063     int worker_count  = get_i32("Kfs.Broker.Workers");
00064     ApplicationQueuePtr app_queue = new ApplicationQueue(worker_count);
00065     DfsBroker::BrokerPtr broker = new KosmosBroker(properties);
00066     ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr chf(new DfsBroker::ConnectionHandlerFactory(
00067         Comm::instance(), app_queue, broker));
00068     InetAddr listen_addr(INADDR_ANY, port);
00069 
00070     Comm::instance()->listen(listen_addr, chf);
00071     app_queue->join();
00072   }
00073   catch (Exception &e) {
00074     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00075     return 1;
00076   }
00077   return 0;
00078 }
